response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and enhance your business operations significantly. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the potential return on investment, I propose to sell it to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the strategic advantage it can provide to your company. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction beneficial for both of us.", "product_price": 15000}
